https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8wX4ikJcUybm9IQWhVzCdHoTmmO.jpg A teenaged girl shatters the mundane life of her average but disconnected family with a rant about what their compulsion to stay connected to the virtual world has done to them all. Disconnected
